description: Discharge of S106 Obligation Schedule 12 (Marketing of Commercial Unit for A4 Use) dated 28.05.2020 for Planning Permission 19/01228/FUL (Redevelopment of the site to provide 297 residential units in buildings ranging from 4 to 7 storeys, with 207 sq m commercial space (A1, A2, A3, A4, B1 and D1) at ground floor, 123 car parking spaces (including car club and accessible provision); communal landscaped amenity areas, secure cycle parking, stopping up of Avenue Terrace and other associated development).
